Test Name: Hepatitis B Virus Core-Related Antigen, Quantitative, Serum (HBcrAg Quantification)
Purpose: To quantitatively measure HBcrAg in serum for accurate monitoring and management of Hepatitis B Virus infection.
Container: Red-top tube or serum separator tube (SST)
Equipment: Automated immunoassay analyzer (e.g., Abbott ARCHITECT i2000SR, Roche Cobas e411)
